    Creating and editing a document in Proton Drive

    Docs in Proton Drive is a collaborative document editor that protects your privacy with end-to-end encryption. This article covers the basics of creating and editing documents using Docs in Proton Drive.

    1. Support
    2. Proton Drive
    3. Using Proton Drive

    Adding comments and feedback in Docs

    Docs in Proton Drive lets you work on documents with others in real time, and comments are a way to improve collaboration. Heres how to use comments in Docs.

    1. Support
    2. Proton Drive
    3. Using Proton Drive

    How to share documents and invite collaborators in Docs in Proton Drive

    There are two ways to share a document and invite collaborators in Docs. This article explains each method.

    How to collaborate in Docs in Proton Drive

    Docs in Proton Drive allows you to work together with others in a secure, encrypted environment. Heres how to get started and make the most of the collaboration features.

    This article explains how to open documents with Docs in Proton Drive and export them.

    Changing default email address and display name for shared files

    If you have changed your default email address or display name, this might not reflect in file sharing invitations and you may wish to update these.

    File sharing via email addresses on mobile and desktop

    Sharing files and folders directly to recipients using their email address is available by logging in to your Proton Drive account in your browser.

    Sharing files in Proton Drive via email to non-Proton users

    Proton Drive lets you share files with anyone by entering their email address.If youre sharing with a non-Proton email address, follow these steps.

    Managing access to shared files and folders

    You can adjust access to your shared files or folders whenever needed, even after youve shared the item. Heres how.

    How to share files and folders in Proton Drive via email

    In Proton Drive, you can share files and folders securely and directly with specific people using their email address. This guide will help you start sharing.

    3. Using Proton Drive

    Previewable file types

    The Proton Drive web app allows you to see previews of many of your stored files. This article explains which file types you can preview.

    File sharing in your Proton Drive cloud storage is safer thanks to our privacy-preserving malware checks.

    Proton Drive logs can help you monitor usage; here's how to access them on macOS and Windows.
